addWatch

(
  • watch
)

Defined in app/js/services/node/apiNode.js:316

Adds a new watcher based upon the contents of the packet.

Parameters:

  • watch ozpIwc.TransportPacket

changesSince

(
  • snapshot
)
Object

Defined in app/js/services/node/apiNode.js:352

From a given snapshot, create a change notifications. This is not a delta, rather it's change structure.

API subclasses can override if there are additional change notifications (e.g. children in DataApi).

Parameters:

  • snapshot Object

    The state of the value at some time in the past.

Returns:

Object:

A record of the current value and the value of the snapshot.

serializeLive

() Object

Defined in app/js/services/node/apiNode.js:131

Serialize the node to a form that conveys both persistent and ephemeral state of the object to be handed off to a new API leader.

Intended to be overridden by subclasses

Returns:

Object:

set

(
  • packet
)

Defined in app/js/services/node/apiNode.js:277

Sets a data based upon the content of the packet. Automatically updates the content type, permissions, entity, and updates the version.

Parameters:

  • packet ozpIwc.TransportPacket

snapshot

() Object

Defined in app/js/services/node/apiNode.js:336

Generates a point-in-time snapshot of this value that can later be sent to {@link ozpIwc.CommonApiValue#changesSince} to determine the changes made to the value. This value should be considered opaque to consumers.

For API subclasses, the default behavior is to simply call toPacket(). Subclasses can override this, but should likely override {@link ozpIwc.CommonApiValue#changesSince} as well.

Returns:

Object:

toPacket

(
  • base
)
ozpIwc.TransportPacket

Defined in app/js/services/node/apiNode.js:257

Turns this value into a packet.

Parameters:
